Experience

Application Engineer tools and practices including:

  • Linux Server Administration (CentOS/RHEL)
  • Upgrade, Support and Configuration of servers and web applications

  • Puppet and Ansible for server configuration and deployment

  • PostgreSQL and Database Administration

  • GIT and SVN

  • OpenResty (based on Nginx)

  • Gitlab CI/CD

    (using command line or Tower as Git client)

  • Bash Scripting

I am currently involved in an on-going global upgrade project for Squiz aligning, configuring and upgrading our large fleet of international servers for streamlined upgrades, as we move towards a SaaS model.

Front-end development tools and practices including:

  • Javascript (ES6/ES7)
  • jQuery

  • CSS3 (Sass, Flexbox, Grid)

  • HTML5

  • React, Vue

  • Git and Version Control

    (using command line or Tower as Git client)

  • Mobile first, responsive design

  • Web Accessibility Standards

I am experienced in building and maintaining responsive, large scale website implementations built in the Matrix CMS and have experience of working in an agile environment and using JIRA for project tracking and management. I also have performed a number of software demos and presentations to prospective clients.

I also have experience in:

  • Java (Eclipse IDE and IntelliJ IDEA)

  • Data structures, algorithm design and AI methodologies

  • PostgreSQL and Relational Database Theory

  • R and data science methodologies
